structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Application Of Secs. 295 P To 295 W To Retail Sales

text.section: Where motor fuel is advertised or offered for sale or sold upon the final liquidation of the business of said retail dealer.
Where motor fuel is sold in good faith to meet the price of a competitor.
Where motor fuel is advertised or offered for sale or sold by any fiduciary or other officer acting under the order or direction of any court.
